actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 845 of title 18, United States Code, relating to explosive materials.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to eliminate the exception from Federal explosives prohibitions for commercially manufactured black powder in quantities not to exceed 50 pounds, percussion caps, safety and pyrotechnic fuses, quills, quick and slow matches, and friction primers, intended to be used solely for sporting, recreational, or cultural purposes in antique firearms or in antique devices as exempted from the term "destructive device."

titles.title: A bill to amend section 845 of title 18, United States Code, relating to explosive materials.
